text: @PMOIndia @narendramodi Request Govt to ensure dat all non -Covid19 patients suffering from other ailments in our country shld be able to go to doctors /hospitals without any obstruction/harrasment by local authorities/police etc. on roads. Govt shld take complaint in such cases to deal appropriately.
